channel.title: Compile problem
channel.description:
ok i am running testscape server amd when i click on compile this comes up in the window that pops up: javac is not recognized as an internal or externel command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue ...
but whn i press any key the window just closes and it does nothing can some one help me here.
oh and p.s what is the compile thing for any ways?

item.title: Compile problem
item.dc:creator: @Danny15 Danny15
item.description:
@Danny15 wrote:

to fix this… go to google.com search JDK and download JDK 5.0 UPDATE 8 (NOT WITH NETBEANS). Go into my computers properties -> advanced tab -> evironmental variabes -> click new ->

ADD::

Name:Classpath
Value : SET CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.

Then click new again…

Name : Path
Value : C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.

then it should work

BTW Compile is used to save your codes or anythin that you added to your server

Read full topic

item.title: Compile problem
item.dc:creator: @Russ512M Russ512M
item.description:
@Russ512M wrote:

Im having the same problem. I Checked the directory that it points to and i have java but not javac. Can anyone tell me whats up?[br][size=1]Posted at: August 16, 2006, 08:38:29 AM[/size][hr]Zoss, can you send me your javac?[br][size=1]Posted at: August 16, 2006, 08:39:54 AM[/size][hr][quote=“pur3 p0op, post:1, topic:9655”]ok i am running testscape server amd when i click on compile this comes up in the window that pops up:
javac is not recognized as an internal or externel command,
operable program or batch file.
press any key to continue …

but whn i press any key the window just closes and it does nothing can some one help me here.

oh and p.s what is the compile thing for any ways?[/quote]

Hi try getting the latest java devlopment kit. I did that and it worked for me. Hope it does for u :)[br][size=1]Posted at: August 16, 2006, 09:02:36 AM[/size][hr]infact. no it hasnt worked
